name: todo
description: A simple todo app for organizing tasks
author: Omer Goren

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "vite" "tsc --project tsconfig.main.json --watch" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.build: vite build && tsc --project tsconfig.main.json && node resources/generate-icons.js && node resources/generate-app-icons.js
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-builder build --publish never
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && electron-builder build --mac --publish never
scripts.package:mac:zip: npm run build && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder build --mac -c.mac.target=zip --publish never
scripts.package:mac:dmg: npm run build && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder build --mac -c.mac.target=dmg -c.dmg.compression=none --publish never
scripts.package:win: npm run build && electron-builder build --win --publish never
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && electron-builder build --linux --publish never
scripts.package:mac:unsigned: npm run build && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder build --mac --publish never
scripts.package:unsigned: npm run build && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder build --publish never
scripts.release: npm run build && electron-builder build --publish always
